subtitle: This loaf will keep well for one week stored in an airtight container.

method.text: Cream butter and sugar together until light and fluffy, Stir in <sup>2</sup>/<sub>3</sub> of the honey. Add the eggs and mashed bananas and mix well.
Sift flour, allspice, soda and salt together and fold into the egg mixture with the raisins. Spoon into a 900 g greased and lined loaf tin and smooth over the surface.
Toss the banana slices in the lemon juice and arrange on top of the loaf. Bake for 1 hour or until well risen and firm to the touch. Cover loaf with foil if it begins to brown too quickly.
Remove from tin. Glaze the top with the remaining honey. Leave to cool completely. Serve in slices.

title: Jamaican sticky fruit loaf
